shortdesc.ph: Configuration of the SDK log file.

plentry.pd:
Full path of the log file. Agora recommends using the default log path. If you need to modify the default log path, make sure the specified path exists and is writable. Default paths:
macOS:
Sandbox enabled: App Sandbox/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log, e.g., /Users/<username>/Library/Containers/<AppBundleIdentifier>/Data/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log.
Sandbox disabled: ~/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log
Windows: C:\Users\<user_name>\AppData\Local\Agora\<process_name>\agorasdk.log.

Size of a single agorasdk.log file in KB. Range: [128, 20480]. Default: 2,048 KB. If you set fileSizeInKByte to less than 128 KB, the SDK automatically adjusts it to 128 KB; if you set it to more than 20,480 KB, the SDK adjusts it to 20,480 KB.
Log output level of the SDK. See . For example, if you choose WARN level, you will see all logs at FATAL, ERROR, and WARN levels.

Full path of the log file. Agora recommends using the default log path. If you need to change the default path, make sure the specified path exists and is writable. Default paths:
Android: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<packagename>/files/agorasdk.log
iOS: App Sandbox/Library/caches/agorasdk.log

Size of a single agorasdk.log log file in KB. The value range is [128, 20480], and the default is 2,048 KB. If you set fileSizeInKByte to less than 128 KB, the SDK automatically adjusts it to 128 KB; if you set it to more than 20,480 KB, the SDK adjusts it to 20,480 KB.
Log output level of the SDK. See . For example, if you choose the WARN level, you will see all logs at FATAL, ERROR, and WARN levels.
Full path of the log file. Agora recommends using the default log path. If you need to change the default log path, make sure the specified path exists and is writable.

Size of a single agorasdk.log log file, in KB. The range is [128, 20480], and the default value is 2,048 KB. If you set fileSizeInKByte to less than 128 KB, the SDK automatically adjusts it to 128 KB; if you set it to more than 20,480 KB, the SDK automatically adjusts it to 20,480 KB.
Log output level of the SDK. See . For example, if you choose the WARN level, you will see all log messages at FATAL, ERROR, and WARN levels.

Full path of the log file. Agora recommends using the default log path. If you need to change the default path, make sure the specified path exists and is writable. Default paths:
Android: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<packagename>/files/agorasdk.log
iOS: App Sandbox/Library/caches/agorasdk.log
macOS:
Sandbox enabled: App Sandbox/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log, e.g., /Users/<username>/Library/Containers/<AppBundleIdentifier>/Data/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log
Sandbox disabled: ~/Library/Logs/agorasdk.log
Windows: C:\Users\<user_name>\AppData\Local\Agora\<process_name>\agorasdk.log

Size of a single agorasdk.log file in KB. The valid range is [128, 20480], with a default of 2048 KB. If you set fileSizeInKByte to less than 128 KB, the SDK automatically adjusts it to 128 KB; if you set it to more than 20480 KB, the SDK adjusts it to 20480 KB.
Log output level of the SDK. See . For example, if you choose WARN level, you will see all log messages at FATAL, ERROR, and WARN levels.
